headline: WunderKIND Ads Revolutionizes CTV Advertising With Introduction of New High-Impact, Programmatic Pause Ad Product
summary: NEW YORK, July 16, 2025--WunderKIND Ads, the advertising division of Wunderkind delivering user-first ad experiences that don’t interrupt content consumption, today announced the launch of WunderKIND CTV Pause Ads, a groundbreaking product expanding its innovative programmatic approach to Connected TV. Developed in partnership with OpenGlass.TV, this technology ensures seamless delivery and optimization across platforms.

content.title: WunderKIND Ads Revolutionizes CTV Advertising With Introduction of New High-Impact, Programmatic Pause Ad Product

Developed in partnership with OpenGlass.TV, this technology ensures seamless delivery and optimization across platforms.

headline: Nutrafol Launches at Ulta Beauty, Expanding National Retail Footprint
summary: Nutrafol, the #1 dermatologist-recommended hair growth supplement brand*, announces its launch at the nation's largest beauty retailer, Ulta Beauty. Beginning July 20, Nutrafol will be available on Ulta.com, with in-store availability rolling out to select locations nationwide starting August 3. This expansion marks Nutrafol's biggest retail milestone to date, significantly increasing accessibility to its suite of science-backed hair health offerings.
